src_original: yāni tāni paṃca amātyaśatāni etāny eva tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;  tadāpy aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ;
tgt_original: 爾時五百雁棄我逝者，今五百比丘走者是。
爾時王梵摩達者，今輸頭檀釋是。 爾時教我使去，今復放我出家。 爾時獵師者，今望伽婆象是。 爾時不害我，今亦不觸。 爾時須默雁侍我後者，今阿難是。

src_original: etarhy apy aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ;  ānandena na parityaktaḥ;  bhūyo 'pi yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ,
tgt_original: 昔不棄我飛，今故不棄我也。

src_original: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgapatir babhūva;
tgt_original: 「比丘重聽！ 去此久遠有師子王，遊於雪山，將五百師子。

src_original: tasya paṃca sṛgālaśatāni vighasakhādakāni nityānubaddhāni parvatam upaniśritya tiṣṭhanti;  siṃhaḥ prāṇino ghātayitvā varamāṃsāni vararudhirāṇi ca pītvā nirapekṣaḥ prakrāmati;
tgt_original: 師子王年耆根熟，兩目無所見。 時師子王在諸師子前行，墮空井，五百師子盡棄去。

src_original: teṣām evaṃ mahān kālo 'tikrāntaḥ;  yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃho mṛgarājaḥ rātrau prāṇinaḥ samanveṣamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ;  teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ sṛgālaśatānām ekonāni prakrāntāni;  ekaḥ kūpataṭe avasthitaḥ;
tgt_original: 去井不遠，有野狐見師子王墮井，便作是念： 『有此王時我常飽滿飲食。

src_original: cintayati ca:  ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenemaṃ samuddhareyam iti;
tgt_original: 我今當思方策使得出井。

src_original: sa itaś cāmutaś ca kūpasāmantakena paryaṭitum ārabdhaḥ;  yāvat paśyati:  kūpasya nātidūre palvalaṃ;
tgt_original: 』去井不遠有大河水，即掘窟通水使來入井。

src_original: ayam ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pitur atyayāt paitryarājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāsyati;  yannv aham ajātaśatrum anvāvartayeyaṃ;
tgt_original: 我今當往以神足化太子，使此居門當受我教。

src_original: yasmin me anvāvṛtte alpakṛcchreṇa mahājanakāyo 'nvāvartiṣyate;  atha devadattaḥ abhijāto hastyājāneyo bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya (A 451a)
tgt_original: 」時調達化身為象，往至阿闍世太子所，從壁入、門中出，作若干變化，欲使阿闍世太子知是調達。

src_original: niveśanam apadvāreṇa praviśya dvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati;  dvāreṇa praviśya apadvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati abhijātaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ bhikṣur api muṇḍaḥ saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ;
tgt_original: 復化身為馬，出入無礙，或從門入、從非門出。

src_original: dahro 'pīdānīṃ kumāraḥ suvarṇamekhalādhārī bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya utsaṅge āvartate;  parivartate saṃvartate;  ajātaśatrur api enaṃ kumāram āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
tgt_original: 或化諸珍寶以作寶冠，在阿闍世太子膝上，太子便取冠之。

src_original: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan;  aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ;  devadattasya ayam evaṃrūpo lābhasatkāra udapādi;  rājāsya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatruḥ vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;  paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
tgt_original: 時阿闍世太子便起嫉妬恚意，調達神足乃欲勝佛，便興供養衣服飲食床臥病瘦醫藥，日送五百釜飯至調達所，嚴五百乘車，將從自至調達所。

src_original: devadattaḥ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra (SBV II 72)
tgt_original: 亦有五百比丘，在調達所坐食。

src_original: upaniṣīdati iti;  śrutvā punaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs  upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;  ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan:  iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ prāvikṣāma;  aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caranto:
tgt_original: 時諸大比丘眾，到時著衣持鉢入羅閱城分衛。

src_original: devadattasyāyam evaṃrūpo lābhsatkāraḥ udapādi;  rājasya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
tgt_original: 時諸比丘聞阿闍世太子供養調達無能過者，乃至嚴五百乘車至調達所。

src_original: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;  devadatto 'pi paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra upaniṣīdati;
tgt_original: 調達所將從五百比丘坐食。
